pdfcreator-tab-panel-header-label: Label for tab which contains PDF header template
pdfcreator-tab-panel-body-label: Label for tab which contains PDF content template
pdfcreator-tab-panel-footer-label: Label for tab which contains PDF footer template
pdfcreator-tab-panel-coverpage-label: Label for tab which contains PDF coverpage template
pdfcreator-tab-panel-main-label: Label for tab which contains description of PDF template
pdfcreator-editor-error-label:
Label of error which shows html validation error in PDF template editor
Parameters:
* $1 - tab name
* $2 - number of line
* $3 - error message
pdfcreator-editor-error-missing-content: {{doc-important|Do not translate {{{content}}}}} Label of validation error that {{{content}}} is missing in content tab
pdfcreator-tab-panel-styles-label: Label for tab which contains PDF styles
pdfcreator-pdf-disclaimer: Disclaimer label which can be used in exported PDF file
pdfcreator-pdf-export-time: Label for timestamp of pdf export
pdfcreator-pdf-param-currentpagenumber-l: Label for pdf export current page numer
pdfcreator-pdf-param-totalpagescount-lab: Label for pdf export total pages count
pdfcreator-tab-panel-intro-label: Label for tab which contains PDF document preface
pdfcreator-tab-panel-outro-label: Label for tab which contains PDF document appendix
pdfcreator-editor-action-save-label:
Button label to save changes on PDF template
{{Identical|Save}}
pdfcreator-editor-action-help-label: Button label to open dialog with help how to edit PDFCreator templates
pdfcreator-dialog-export-title: Title of dialog to start export of a page
pdfcreator-dialog-export-action-export-l: Label of action button in dialog to start export
pdfcreator-dialog-export-mode-selection-: Label for field layout which contains a dropdown with selection how page should be exported
pdfcreator-dialog-export-template-select: Label for field layout which contains a dropdown with all possible templates
pdfcreator-export-plugin-mode-option-sub: Label for radio button to export page including subpages
pdfcreator-export-plugin-mode-option-rec: Label for radio button to export page with linked pages
pdfcreator-toc-page-label: Label for pdf page with table of contents
pdfcreator-dialog-button-title: Button title to open export dialog
pdfcreator-dialog-button-text: Aria label for button to export page
pdfcreator-config-suppress-namespace: Label for input field to set config variable to suppress page namespace in pdf
pdfcreator-config-suppress-namespace-hel: Help text for input field to suppress page namespace in pdf
pdfcreator-config-default-pdf-template: Label for input field to set config variable for default export template
pdfcreator-config-default-pdf-template-h: Help text for input field to set default export template
pdfcreator-config-coverbackground: Label for input field to set config variable for cover background image for PDF templates
pdfcreator-config-coverbackground-help: Help text for input field to set cover background image for PDF templates
pdfcreator-pageparam-username: Description of a pdf template parameter providing username of exporting user
pdfcreator-pageparam-user-realname: Description of a pdf template parameter providingShows real name of exporting user
pdfcreator-pageparam-export-date: Description of a pdf template parameter providing export date
pdfcreator-pageparam-export-time: Description of a pdf template parameter providing export time
pdfcreator-pageparam-title: Description of a pdf template parameter providing page title
pdfcreator-pageparam-currentpagenumber: Description of a pdf template parameter providing current page number
pdfcreator-pageparam-totalpagescount: Description of a pdf template parameter providing total pages count
pdfcreator-pageparam-logo: Description of a pdf template parameter providing wiki logo
pdfcreator-tag-pagebreak-label: Label for tag to indicate page break
pdfcreator-droplet-pagebreak-name: Title of droplet for tag pdfbreak
pdfcreator-droplet-pagebreak-description: Description of droplet for tag pdfbreak
pdfcreator-droplet-no-export-name: Title of droplet for tags exclude from PDF
pdfcreator-droplet-no-export-description: Description of droplet for tags exclude from PDF
pdfcreator-exclude-export-tool-title: Title for VE tool to add exclude tags
pdfcreator-export-pdf-inspector-title: Title of VE inspector for export tag
pdfcreator-export-pdf-inspector-page-lay: Label for input field to set page title
pdfcreator-export-pdf-inspector-export-m: Label for dropdown to select export mode
pdfcreator-export-pdf-inspector-export-t: Label for dropdown to select PDF template
pdfcreator-export-pdf-inspector-export-l: Label for input field to add text which will be used for export link
pdfcreator-page-break-tool-title: Title of page break tool tag
pdfcreator-content-non-existing-page: Label for pdf page if it does not exist
pdfcreator-notification-pdf-creation-don: Label for notification to inform that pdf export is completed
pdfcreator-tab-panel-options-label: Label for tab which contains PDF template options
